amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for hydrogen research by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of June 22 as amendment No. 3, that reduces the appropriation for energy supply, research and development activities by $5 million

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrett (WI) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 243 (Roll no. 483).
